CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: v.124 - Edge Updates experience migrates into Browser Essentials
CurrentVersion.description: Notifications on available Edge Updates will come from Browser Essentials instead of the Settings page for better visibility and experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Edge Updates experience migrates into Browser Essentials
OldVersion.description: Getting alerts on available Edge Updates will come from Browser Essentials instead of the Settings page for better visibility and experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Click-to-Chat with Teams App Publishers
CurrentVersion.description: This feature enables users of Teams Admin Center to quickly and easily open a private Teams chat between themselves and a third-party app publisher to directly ask questions on pricing, compliance or other topics as they consider the deployment and/or purchase of the app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Click-to-Chat with Teams App Publishers
OldVersion.description: This feature enables users of Teams Admin Center to quickly and easily open a private Teams chat between themselves and a third-party app publisher to directly ask questions on pricing, compliance or other topics as they consider the deployment and/or purchase of the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Shared display mode for BYOD meeting rooms
CurrentVersion.description: The new shared display mode provides users the ability to extend their Teams meeting via a pop-out and view-only version of the stage onto the TV screen in BYOD meeting rooms. This mode ensures the meeting content is extended to the front of the room for others to see and provides the host the peace of mind their desktop is for their viewing only, minimizes the personal information that others in the room can see.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New Shared display mode for BYOD meeting rooms
OldVersion.description: The new shared display mode provides users the ability to extend their Teams meeting via a pop-out and view-only version of the stage onto the TV screen in BYOD meeting rooms. This mode ensures the meeting content is extended to the front of the room for others to see and provides the host the peace of mind their desktop is for their viewing only, minimizes the personal information that others in the room can see.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Bing search integration brings the power of the web to your chats in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Ask Copilot a question in Word chat and Copilot generates an answer using the power of integrated Bing search. And you never have to leave the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Bring the latest from your organization into your Word chats with Microsoft Copilot Graph-grounded search
CurrentVersion.description: Ask Copilot a question in Word chat, and Copilot generates an answer using the rich, people-centric data and insights in the Microsoft cloud. That's the power of Copilot and Microsoft Graph.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Bring the latest from your organization into your Word chats with Microsoft Copilot Graph-grounded search
CurrentVersion.description: Ask Copilot a question in Word chat, and Copilot generates an answer using the rich, people-centric data and insights in the Microsoft cloud. That's the power of Copilot and Microsoft Graph.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Bing search integration brings the power of the web to your chats in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Ask Copilot a question in Word chat, and Copilot generates an answer using the power of integrated Bing search. And you never have to leave the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Bing search integration brings the power of the web to your chats in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Ask Copilot a question in Word chat, and Copilot generates an answer using the power of integrated Bing search. And you never have to leave the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Bring the latest from your organization into your Word chats with Microsoft Copilot Graph-grounded search
CurrentVersion.description: Ask Copilot a question in Word chat, and Copilot generates an answer using the rich, people-centric data and insights in the Microsoft cloud. That's the power of Copilot and Microsoft Graph.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - HighCompleteness parameter in Search-UnifiedAuditLog Audit cmdlet
CurrentVersion.description: ,Microsoft is introducing a new query parameter which allows you to switch between performance and completeness of query results based on the scenario requirement. When enabled, the query returns more complete search results but may take significantly longer to run. When disabled, the query runs faster but may have missing search results.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - HighCompleteness parameter in Search-UnifiedAuditLog Audit cmdlet
OldVersion.description: ,Microsoft is introducing a new query parameter which allows you to switch between performance and completeness of query results based on the scenario requirement. When enabled, the query returns more complete search results but may take significantly longer to run. When disabled, the query runs faster but may have missing search results.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: macOS Platform SSO Support
CurrentVersion.description: ,Enable logging in on a managed Mac using your Entra ID password.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: macOS Platform SSO Support
OldVersion.description: ,Enable logging in on a managed Mac using your Entra ID password.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New logs for Audit activities
CurrentVersion.description: ,Activities performed by users like submitting an Audit search query, viewing and exporting Audit logs, and deleting search history within the Purview Audit feature will now begin to generate Audit logs.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New logs for Audit activities
OldVersion.description: ,Activities performed by users like submitting an Audit search query, viewing and exporting Audit logs, and deleting search history within the Purview Audit feature will now begin to generate Audit logs.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Pages - Heading levels for web parts
CurrentVersion.description: When authoring pages, this will create the ability to choose heading level for webparts to help define the hierarchy of information on a page.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Pages - Heading levels for web parts
OldVersion.description: When authoring pages, this will create the ability to choose heading level for webparts to help define the hierarchy of information on a page.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: v.124 - Updated Edge Profile account re-authentication popup when Browser to Web Single-Sign-On (SSO) fails.
CurrentVersion.description:
Edge provides a browser to Web single sign-on (SSO) capability that lets a user sign in to their Edge Profile with a web account first and then automatically sign them into Microsoft first party websites.
	
This is done by saving cached credentials. This approach works until there's an authentication challenge to the cached credentials. A typical scenario is when a user changes their password on a different device. The cached credentials on the current device become outdated and SSO fails. Edge detects this failure and shows a re-authentication popup that prompts the user to update their cached credentials on the current device.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: Updated reauthentication flyout when Web Single Sign-On fails
OldVersion.description: Users who encounter Web Single Sign-On (SSO) failures for User Interaction Required (UIR) accounts will experience a flyout with a call to action to sign in and verify their account.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Purview capabilities in Copilot for Security
CurrentVersion.description: With Microsoft Purview capabilities in Copilot for Security, your security teams gain unprecedented visibility across the security data. Microsoft Purview brings user risk and data risk insights to help the SOC with comprehensive and enriched signals to understand the full attack story and impact of a security incident. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Insider Risk Management - Microsoft Purview capabilities in Copilot for Security
OldVersion.description: With Microsoft Purview capabilities in Copilot for Security, your security teams gain unprecedented visibility across the security data. Microsoft Purview brings user risk and data risk insights to help the SOC with comprehensive and enriched signals to understand the full attack story and impact of a security incident. Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Premium content AI Graph API in Beta (formerly known as Syntex)
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are releasing new Graph APIs for SharePoint Premium content AI capabilities in Beta (formerly known as Syntex models). You will be able to build applications using these new Graph API calls: get a Syntex model by its name, get a Syntex model by its ID, apply a Syntex model to document libraries, un-apply a Syntex model from document libraries, list all the applied document libraries of a Syntex model, create a document processing job, and get a document processing job.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Excel – Formula Conditional Formatting
CurrentVersion.description: Additional support for complex conditional formats beyond the basic top and bottom or conditional operators. For example, Copilot analyzes two factors when highlighting all rows where the product is bikes and sales is greater than 100.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Bulk replacement or removal of a retention label
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can perform a bulk replacement or removal of a retention label using the Purview compliance portal. They can perform the action across the entire tenant or targeted to specific content using KQL and static or adaptive scopes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New logs for Audit activities
CurrentVersion.description: Activities performed by users within the Purview Audit feature, like submitting an Audit search query, viewing and exporting Audit logs, and deleting search history, will now begin to generate Audit logs.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New logs for Audit activities
OldVersion.description: Activities performed by users within the Purview Audit feature, like submitting an Audit search query, viewing and exporting Audit logs, and deleting search history, will now begin to generate Audit logs.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search
CurrentVersion.description: Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as Record ID, UserKey, UserType, and ClientIP.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Audit - New filters in Audit Search
OldVersion.description: Audit Search allows customers to retrieve audit logs relevant to a security or compliance investigation. With this change, customers will now be able to search for relevant audit logs using additional fields such as Record ID, UserKey, UserType, and ClientIP.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Webinar - Disable social share for attendees
CurrentVersion.description: Disable the ability for attendees to share the webinar event page to social networking sites for public events post-registration.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 Apps: Availability of the Cloud Policy service for Microsoft 365 Government GCC
CurrentVersion.description:
The Cloud policy service will begin rolling out for Microsoft 365 GCC customers late June 2024. The Cloud Policy service allows Microsoft 365 administrators to configure policies for Microsoft 365 apps and assign these policies using Microsoft 365 or Entra ID groups. Once configured, these policies are automatically enforced as users sign in and use Microsoft 365 apps. The initial release will support policies for Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise on Windows and future updates will bring support for additional applications and platforms. For additional information about the Cloud Policy service, refer to Overview of the Cloud Policy service for Microsoft 365 Apps for enterprise.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/deployoffice/admincenter/overview-office-cloud-policy-service

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft 365 admin centers –  Manage Teams apps that work on Outlook and Microsoft 365 App
CurrentVersion.description: Administrators using the Microsoft 365 admin center and Teams admin center who manage Teams apps that work on Outlook and the Microsoft 365 App will be able to apply their changes across all three clients (Teams, Outlook and Microsoft 365 App). Before this update, changes made through the Integrated Apps section in the Microsoft 365 admin center would only affect these apps on Outlook and the Microsoft 365 App; similarly, changes made in the Teams admin center would exclusively affect Teams. With this change, management of these apps will be unified across Teams, Outlook and Microsoft 365 App.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Enhanced multiple action experience from Threat explorer
CurrentVersion.description: SecOps can take multiple actions such as purging emails, submissions, and Tenant-level block actions through a single wizard on the bulk of messages. In addition, Tenant-level block URL and File actions are now available directly from Threat explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Edge: v.124 - Edge Updates experience migrates into Browser Essentials
CurrentVersion.description: Notifications on available Edge Updates will come from Browser Essentials instead of the Settings page for better visibility and experience.
